description:
Built for rugged outdoor adventures. The Bushcraft Survival Knife's stainless steel blade is equipped a versatile scandi grind. An ergonomic handle fits well in your hand to build a shelter or prep meals. A modular sheath holds a fire steel and sharpening stone so you're always prepared.

  • Scandi-ground blade is great for a variety of outdoor tasks
  • Sheath has an integrated diamond sharpening stone and a secure fire steel holder
  • Modular sheath works at or below belt line or clipped to any strap or belt
  • Included fire steel works in wet or dry conditions and provides thousands of uses
  • Flat-ground spine acts as a perfect scraper for a fire steel
  • Mora knives have been crafted in Mora, Sweden, since 1891
name: Mora Bushcraft Survival Stainless Knife
